title: Amber Heard stuns in a flowing red gown at Golden Globes Awards 2016
title_page: Amber Heard stuns in a flowing red gown at Golden Globes Awards 2016 | Daily Mail Online
text:
Amber Heard looked ravishing in red at the Golden Globe Awards.
The 29-year-old stunned in her crimson floor-length frock, which featured a textured neckline and sheer overlay on Sunday in Beverly Hills.
The actress, who looked like a classic Hollywood star in the elegant gown, paired the flowing number with deep red lipstick.
See our full Golden Globes coverage on all the winners and red carpet fashion
Scroll down for video
Amber Heard stunned in a crimson floor-length frock, which featured a textured neckline and sheer overlay
The star's sleeveless gown cinched at her waist, revealing her svelte figure.
The textured detail around her neckline, which resembled flowers, continued down the back of her gown.
The Rum Diary actress donned two diamond rings, including her wedding band, as well as dangling earrings.
She paired her red lips with brown eyeshadow and black rimmed lids, finishing it off with shimmery pink blush.
The 29-year-old looked like a classic Hollywood actress in the elegant gown, pairing the flowing number with deep red lipstick
Amber styled her light brown hair with a deep side part and classic Hollywood waves.
The starlet, who is a presenter at this year's Globes, walked the red carpet without her husband, Johnny Depp.
Dressed to the nines: The star's sleeveless gown cinched at her waist, revealing her svelte figure
The couple will be celebrating their one year wedding anniversary in February.
The Blindspot actress Jaimie Alexander and Amber had to briefly pause on stage while presenting the Best Actor in a Limited Series as the person working the teleprompter made a mistake.
'Dude, who's typing this s**t?' Jaimie asked as the ladies stumbled over their words while on stage.
